Galâmka has fallen! The battle for Maurûsh has been lost!
Enter into the passage from Ub Nishir to begin the attack on the Orcs in Maurûsh.
Galâmka has fallen! The battle for Maurûsh has been lost!

Galâmka takes a moment to catch his breath.

'I did not expect the Orcs to have overrun this passage. No matter, we must press on.

'This is the entrance into Maurûsh. Here is where we will take our stand. Are you ready, friend?'
Galâmka has fallen! The battle for Maurûsh has been lost!

You escaped from Maurûsh and the Orcs

Head up the stairs
'Let us keep pushing forward!'
Continue following Galâmka through the passage to get to the stronghold of Maurûsh.
'Enough of this!'
'Over there, that must be their leader! We need to take him down!'
You have arrived at the entrance into Maurûsh. Speak with Galâmka when you are ready to continue the fight.
You enter the passage from Ub Nishir, the battle for Maurûsh has begun!
Escape back to the mountain passage!
Placeholder Talk
'The battle is underway! Orcs have found their way into the passage!'
Placeholder
Placeholder
Reach the outdoors
You have made it to Râkdakul, the Utûgi who is leading the Orcs here in Maurûsh. He must be stopped so the stronghold can be reclaimed.
'Such weaklings dare to challenge me?'
Head up the stairs
Râkdakul and the Orcs proved too powerful. Escape Maurûsh back into the mountain passage!
Râkdakul and the Orcs proved too powerful. Escape Maurûsh back into the mountain passage!
The stairs are cleared. Reconvene with Galâmka
'You can not stand against me!'
Proceed out of the passage and into the stronghold of Maurûsh to continue the battle.
'I will waste no more time here. I leave you to die in your futile efforts to take this stronghold.'
Defeat the Orcs
The fight in Maurûsh continues. You must push your way up the stairs to bring the battle to the leader of the Orcs.
Continue through the passage
'The way into the stronghold is just ahead!'
'Quickly! This way!'
'Râkdakul is gone, and we can not win this fight! We must escape back to the mountain passage!'
More Orcs are coming!
Reconvene with Galamka at the top of the stairs in the stronghold of Maurûsh to bring the fight to the leader of the Orcs here.
The staircase is cleared. Speak with Galâmka
Speak with Galâmka
'They are coming! We must fight!'
'More are coming!'
'Run!'
